Priority Signs.name: Give way
Priority Signs.description: Drivers must yield to vehicles moving on the intersecting road, and in the presence of plate 7.13 - to vehicles moving on the main road.

Priority Signs.name: Stop
Priority Signs.description: Movement without stopping before the stop line, and if it is absent - before the edge of the intersecting carriageway, is prohibited. The driver must yield to vehicles moving on the intersecting road, and in the presence of plate 7.13 - to vehicles moving on the main road. Sign 2.5 may be placed before a railway crossing or quarantine post. In such cases, the driver must stop before the stop line, and if it is absent - before the sign.

Priority Signs.name: Priority for oncoming traffic
Priority Signs.description: Entering a narrow section of road is prohibited if it would impede oncoming traffic. The driver must yield to oncoming vehicles located in the narrow section or at the opposite entrance to it.

Priority Signs.name: Priority over oncoming traffic
Priority Signs.description: Narrow section of road where the driver has priority over oncoming vehicles.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No entry
Prohibitory Signs.description: Entry of all vehicles in the indicated direction is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No movement
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of all vehicles is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No motor vehicles
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of motor vehicles is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No trucks
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of trucks and vehicle combinations with a maximum permitted weight exceeding 3.5 tons (if the weight is not indicated on the sign) or exceeding the weight indicated on the sign, as well as tractors and self-propelled machines, is prohibited. Sign 3.4 does not prohibit the movement of trucks with a white diagonal stripe on the sides of the body or intended for passenger transport.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No motorcycles
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of motorcycles is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No tractors
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of tractors and self-propelled machines is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No towing
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of trucks and tractors with trailers of any type, as well as towing of motor vehicles, is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No horse-drawn vehicles
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of horse-drawn carts (sledges), riding and pack animals, as well as driving livestock is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No bicycles
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of bicycles and mopeds is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No pedestrians
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of pedestrians is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: Weight limit
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of vehicles, including vehicle combinations, whose actual weight exceeds the figure indicated on the sign, is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: Axle weight limit
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of vehicles in which the actual weight on any axle exceeds the figure indicated on the sign is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: Height limit
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of vehicles whose overall height (with or without load) exceeds the figure indicated on the sign is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: Width limit
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of vehicles whose overall width (with or without load) exceeds the figure indicated on the sign is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: Length limit
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of vehicles (vehicle combinations) whose overall length (with or without load) exceeds the figure indicated on the sign is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: Minimum distance limit
Prohibitory Signs.description: Movement of vehicles with a distance between them less than indicated on the sign is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: Customs
Prohibitory Signs.description: Prohibits passing the customs checkpoint without stopping.

Prohibitory Signs.name: Danger
Prohibitory Signs.description: Prohibits movement of all vehicles without exception due to a traffic accident, fire, or other danger.

Prohibitory Signs.name: Control
Prohibitory Signs.description: Prohibits passing the control point without stopping.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No right turn
Prohibitory Signs.description: Turning to the right is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No left turn
Prohibitory Signs.description: Turning to the left is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No U-turn
Prohibitory Signs.description: U-turns are prohibited; left turns are allowed.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No overtaking
Prohibitory Signs.description: Overtaking of all vehicles except slow-moving vehicles, horse-drawn carts, mopeds, and two-wheeled motorcycles without sidecars is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: End of no overtaking zone
Prohibitory Signs.description: Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Similique, expedita

Prohibitory Signs.name: No overtaking for trucks
Prohibitory Signs.description: Overtaking is prohibited for trucks with a maximum permissible weight of over 3.5 tons.

Prohibitory Signs.name: End of no overtaking zone for trucks
Prohibitory Signs.description: Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Similique, expedita

Prohibitory Signs.name: Maximum speed limit
Prohibitory Signs.description: Driving at a speed exceeding the one indicated on the sign (km/h) is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: End of maximum speed limit zone
Prohibitory Signs.description: Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Similique, expedita

Prohibitory Signs.name: No honking
Prohibitory Signs.description: The use of sound signals is prohibited, except when necessary to prevent a traffic accident.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No stopping
Prohibitory Signs.description: Stopping and parking of vehicles is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No parking
Prohibitory Signs.description: Parking of vehicles is prohibited.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No parking on odd-numbered days
Prohibitory Signs.description: Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Similique, expedita

Prohibitory Signs.name: No parking on even-numbered days
Prohibitory Signs.description: When signs 3.29 and 3.30 are used simultaneously on opposite sides of the road, parking is allowed on both sides from 19:00 to 21:00 (relocation time).

Prohibitory Signs.name: End of all restrictions
Prohibitory Signs.description: Indicates the end of a zone where multiple restrictions were simultaneously in effect (e.g., signs 3.16, 3.20, 3.22, 3.24, 3.26–3.30).

Prohibitory Signs.name: No vehicles carrying dangerous goods
Prohibitory Signs.description: Prohibits the movement of vehicles equipped with 'Dangerous Goods' signs.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No vehicles with explosive and flammable materials
Prohibitory Signs.description: Prohibits the movement of vehicles carrying explosive or flammable materials unless in limited quantities and in compliance with special transport regulations.

Prohibitory Signs.name: No buses
Prohibitory Signs.description: Prohibits the movement of buses and minibuses engaged in passenger transport.

Prohibitory Signs.name: End of no bus zone
Prohibitory Signs.description: Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Similique, expedita

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Straight Ahead Only
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Signs 4.1.1–4.1.6 permit movement only in the direction indicated by the arrows. Signs allowing a left turn also permit passing on the left side of the road. These signs can be combined as a group of arrows corresponding to permitted directions at a specific intersection.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Turn Right Only
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Signs 4.1.1–4.1.6 permit movement only in the direction indicated by the arrows. Signs allowing a left turn also permit passing on the left side of the road. These signs can be combined as a group of arrows corresponding to permitted directions at a specific intersection.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Turn Left Only
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Signs 4.1.1–4.1.6 permit movement only in the direction indicated by the arrows. Signs allowing a left turn also permit passing on the left side of the road. These signs can be combined as a group of arrows corresponding to permitted directions at a specific intersection.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Straight or Right Turn Only
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Signs 4.1.1–4.1.6 permit movement only in the direction indicated by the arrows. Signs allowing a left turn also permit passing on the left side of the road. These signs can be combined as a group of arrows corresponding to permitted directions at a specific intersection.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Straight or Left Turn Only
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Signs 4.1.1–4.1.6 permit movement only in the direction indicated by the arrows. Signs allowing a left turn also permit passing on the left side of the road. These signs can be combined as a group of arrows corresponding to permitted directions at a specific intersection.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Right or Left Turn Only
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Signs 4.1.1–4.1.6 permit movement only in the direction indicated by the arrows. Signs allowing a left turn also permit passing on the left side of the road. These signs can be combined as a group of arrows corresponding to permitted directions at a specific intersection.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Pass the Obstacle on the Right
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Passing the obstacle is only allowed on the side indicated by the arrow.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Multi-Track Railway
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Sign used to indicate a multi-track railway crossing.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Pass the Obstacle on Either Side
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Passing on either side of the obstacle is allowed.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Roundabout Movement
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Movement is permitted in the direction indicated by the arrows (around the circle).

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Movement of Light Vehicles Only
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Only light vehicles, buses, route transport, trucks with a maximum allowed weight not exceeding 3.5 tons, and motorcycles are allowed.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Bicycle Path
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Only bicycles are allowed. If there’s no pedestrian path available, pedestrians may also use it, provided they do not obstruct cyclists. A pedestrian symbol may be additionally shown.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: End of Bicycle Path
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Indicates the end of sign 4.5.1. A pedestrian symbol may also be shown.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Pedestrian Path
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Only pedestrian traffic is allowed. If there's no separate bicycle path, bicycles are permitted, provided cyclists do not interfere with pedestrians. A bicycle symbol may be added.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: End of Pedestrian Path
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: End of sign 4.6.1. A bicycle symbol may also be added.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Minimum Speed Limit
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Movement is allowed only at the indicated speed (km/h) or higher, but not exceeding the limits specified in points 106 and 107 of the Traffic Rules.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: End of Minimum Speed Zone
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: End of the area where sign 4.7 applies.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Direction for Vehicles with Dangerous Goods – Left Only
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Movement of vehicles marked with a 'Dangerous Goods' sign is permitted only to the left.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Direction for Dangerous Goods Vehicles – Straight Only
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Movement of vehicles marked with a 'Dangerous Goods' sign is permitted only straight ahead.

Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.name: Direction for Dangerous Goods Vehicles – Right Only
Аломатҳои фармондеҳ.description: Movement of vehicles marked with a 'Dangerous Goods' sign is permitted only to the right.

Information Signs.name: Highway
Information Signs.description: Signs 5.1 and 5.2 indicate the beginning and end of a road where special requirements of the Rules regarding traffic on highways apply.

Information Signs.name: Road for Motor Vehicles
Information Signs.description: A road intended only for the movement of cars, buses, and motorcycles.

Information Signs.name: End of Road for Motor Vehicles
Information Signs.description: Cancels the effect of sign 5.3.

Information Signs.name: One-Way Road
Information Signs.description: A road or carriageway where traffic moves in one direction across its entire width.

Information Signs.name: End of One-Way Road
Information Signs.description: Cancels the effect of sign 5.5.

Information Signs.name: Exit to a One-Way Road
Information Signs.description: Exit to a road or carriageway where traffic is allowed only in the direction indicated on the sign.

Information Signs.name: Direction of Movement by Lanes
Information Signs.description: The number of lanes and permitted directions of movement on each of them.

Information Signs.name: Direction of Movement by Lane
Information Signs.description:
Permitted directions of movement by lane.
Signs 5.8.1 and 5.8.2 may include information about movement restrictions at intersections (images of prohibitory or mandatory signs). Signs 5.8.1 and 5.8.2, which allow left turns from the far-left lane, also permit U-turns from this lane. The shape of the arrows may vary depending on the specific intersection layout. The effect of signs 5.8.1 and 5.8.2 placed before an intersection applies to the entire intersection unless other signs (5.8.1, 5.8.2, or 4.1.1–4.1.6) at the intersection indicate otherwise. Signs 5.8.1 and 5.8.2 do not apply to route vehicles.

Information Signs.name: Start of Lane
Information Signs.description: The beginning of an additional lane on an incline or acceleration lane.

Information Signs.name: Start of a Central Lane on a Three-Lane Road for Traffic in the Specified Direction or Start of a Left-Turn or U-Turn Lane
Information Signs.description: Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Similique, expedita

Information Signs.name: End of Lane
Information Signs.description: The end of an additional lane on an incline or acceleration lane.

Information Signs.name: End of Lane for Traffic in the Specified Direction

Information Signs.name: Direction of Movement by Lanes
Information Signs.description:
If sign 5.8.7 includes an image of a prohibitory or mandatory sign for a certain type of vehicle, the specified restrictions, conditions, or traffic rules apply to the relevant lane.
Parts of signs 5.8.7 and 5.8.8 indicating the number of lanes for oncoming traffic may be executed as separate signs placed close to each other.
Sign 5.8.7 can be used on roads with four or more lanes, corresponding to the number of arrows.

Information Signs.name: Number of Lanes
Information Signs.description: Indicates the number of traffic lanes and the order of movement by lanes. The driver must comply with the requirements of the signs depicted on the arrows.

Information Signs.name: Lane for Route Vehicles
Information Signs.description:
A lane intended only for the movement of public transport vehicles.
The sign applies to the lane above which it is placed. A sign placed on the right side of the road applies to the rightmost lane.

Information Signs.name: Road with a Lane for Route Vehicles
Information Signs.description: A road where public transport moves in a specially designated lane against the general flow of vehicles.

Information Signs.name: Taxi Stand
Information Signs.description: The sign indicates an area on the roadway or a special area designated only for taxis.

Information Signs.name: Parking (Parking Area)
Information Signs.description: The sign indicates a special area, a zone on the roadway, or a pedestrian path designated for vehicle parking. To clarify the direction of movement, distance to the special area, and parking conditions, additional plates may be used with sign 5.15.

Information Signs.name: Pedestrian Crossing
Information Signs.description: The signs indicate an area for pedestrians to cross the roadway. If there is no marking 1.14.1 or 1.14.2 at the crossing, sign 5.16.1 is placed on the right side of the road closest to approaching vehicles.

Information Signs.name: The signs indicate an area for pedestrians to cross the roadway. If there is no marking 1.14.1 or 1.14.2 at the crossing, sign 5.16.2 is placed on the left side of the road farthest from approaching vehicles.

Information Signs.name: Recommended Speed
Information Signs.description: The speed at which it is recommended to drive on a given section of the road. The sign's coverage extends to the nearest intersection and, when used in conjunction with a warning sign, its effect is determined by the length of the hazardous section.

Information Signs.name: Dead End
Information Signs.description: Indicates a road with no through passage, but does not prohibit movement towards the dead end.

Information Signs.name: Preliminary Direction Indicator
Information Signs.description:
Indicates the direction of movement towards populated areas or other structures. The signs may include highway symbols, airports, images of signs 5.29.1, 5.29.2, as well as other symbols and signs informing about traffic conditions. The lower part of sign 5.20.1 indicates the distance from the placement location to the intersection or the start of the deceleration lane.
Sign 5.20.1 is also used to indicate detour routes around sections of the road where one of the prohibitory signs 3.4, 3.6, 3.11, 3.12, 3.13–3.15 is installed. In this case, the sign must depict the detour route around the obstacle and the relevant prohibitory sign.

The signs may include the distance to the mentioned structures (km), highway symbols, airports, images of signs 5.29.1, 5.29.2, as well as other symbols and signs informing about traffic conditions.
